Imvani pemphero langa, Yehova; nditcherere khutu kupemba kwanga;ndiyankheni mwa chikhulupiriko chanu, mwa chilungamo chanu.
Ndipo musaitane mlandu wa mtumiki wanu;pakuti pamaso panu sipadzakhala wolungama wamoyo mmodzi yense.
Pakuti mdani alondola moyo wanga;apondereza pansi moyo wanga;andikhalitsa mumdima monga iwo adafa kale lomwe.
Potero mzimu wanga wakomoka mwa ine;mtima wanga utenga nkhawa m'kati mwanga.
Ndikumbukira masiku a kale lomwe;zija mudazichita ndilingirirapo;ndikamba pandekha za ntchito ya manja anu.
Nditambalitsira manja anga kwa Inu:Moyo wanga ulira Inu monga dziko lolira mvula.
Fulumirani ndiyankheni, Yehova; mzimu wanga ukutha.Musandibisire nkhope yanu;ndingafanane nao akutsikira kudzenje.
Mundimvetse chifundo chanu mamawa;popeza ndikhulupirira Inu:Mundidziwitse njira ndiyendemo;popeza ndikweza moyo wanga kwa Inu.
Mundilanditse kwa adani anga, Yehova;ndibisala mwa Inu.
Mundiphunzitse chokonda Inu; popeza Inu ndinu Mulungu wanga;Mzimu wanu ndi wokoma; munditsogolere kuchidikha.
Mundipatse moyo, Yehova, chifukwa cha dzina lanu;mwa chilungamo chanu mutulutse moyo wanga m'sautso.
Ndipo mwa chifundo chanu mundidulire adani anga,ndipo muononge onse akusautsa moyo wanga;pakuti ine ndine mtumiki wanu.
